analysis.purpose: Coordinate meeting plans and discuss potential gathering with high-profile individuals

notable_quotes: I will have no trouble getting anyone you want

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Boris Nikolic coordinating meeting plans, with Epstein boasting about his ability to contact various high-profile individuals including Mick Jagger, Ken Starr, Clinton, and Julie Taymor for potential gatherings.
